Verses: 1 en Siruvayadhu Thodangi Anegandharam Ennai Nerukkinaargal.
2 en Siruvayadhu Thodangi Anegandharam Ennai Nerukkiyum, Ennai Merkollaamarponaargal.
3 uzhugiravargal En Mudhuginmel Uzhudhu, Thangal Padaichchaalgalai Neelamaakkinaargal.
4 karththaro Needhiyullavar; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Kayirugalai Avar Aruththaar Endru, Isravel Ippozhudhu Solvadhaaga.
5 seeyonaip Pagaikkira Anaivarum Vetkip Pinnittuth Thirumbakkadavargal.
6 veettinmel Mulaikkum Pullukku Avargal Oppaavaargalaaga; Adhu Valarumun Ularndhupom.
7 arukkiravan Adhinaal Than Kaiyaiyum, Arigalaik Kattugiravan Than Madiyaiyum Nirappuvadhillai.
8 karththarudaiya Aaseervaadham Ungalukku Undaavadhaaga; Karththarin Naamaththinaal Ungalai Aaseervadhikkirom Endru Vazhippokkar Solvadhumillai.
